name: Ghost Cart Protection Service
description:
Created over roughly a week as a little test project.

Please leave any feedback down below! I'm not sure if I'll keep working on this in the future, but it's been a fun distraction.

If I did keep working on this, my next steps would be:

- Better Tutorial Images

- Give each character unique stats & unlock them as you go

- Add an upgrade shop between levels

- Vary up the level layout

- Spawn unique ghosts that require a different strategy

- Have ghosts go after dropped treasure, not just the cart

Thanks for checking this out!
